Wisdom: أَلَا وَإِنَّ اللِّسَانَ بَضْعَةٌ مِنَ الْإِنْسَانِ فَلَا يُسْعِدُهُ الْقَوْلُ إِذَا امْتَنَعَ وَلَا يُمْهِلُهُ النُّطْقُ إِذَا اتَّسَعَ
enWisdom: Know that the tongue is a part of a person’s body, so when he desists, speech will not assist him and when he opens up [and is ready to speak], speech will not give him time to pause

Wisdom: زَلَّةُ اللِّسَانِ أَنْكَى مِنْ إِصَابَةِ السِّنَانِ
enWisdom: The slip of the tongue is more harmful than the thrust of the spearhead
The slip of the tongue causes the greatest destruction
The slips of the tongue cannot be controlled
